Utilities Sub-package
=====================

Specification:

    1. Any module or sub-package not related to testing.
    2. Group by context:
        +-----------------+------------------------+
        |     context     |     member function    |
        +=================+========================+
        | system          | execute()              |
        +-----------------+------------------------+
        | git             | clone(), revparse()    |
        +-----------------+------------------------+
        | socket          | send()                 |
        +-----------------+------------------------+

    3. Different utilities can be implemented as a single module or as a sub-package.
